src_original: pratighaḥ katamaḥ /  sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣvāghātaḥ /

duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ  samudaye dharmajñānaṃ samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānaṃ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ  nirodhe dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ nirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ  mārge dharmajñānaṃ mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ mārge 'nvayajñānam //  evaṃca ṣoḍaśa jñānakṣāntibhirdarśanamārgaprabhedāḥ //
duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñāne ca pratyātmaṃ pratyakṣānubhāvinī anāsravā prajñā utpadyate yaduttaramanvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇām
tasmāducyate duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntiḥ //  duḥkhe anvayajñānaṃ katamat /
tadanantaramanāsravaṃ jñānamutpadyate /  yena jñānena duḥkhe anvayajñānakṣāntimupadhārayati /  tad duḥkhe 'nvayajñānamityucyate //
dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭayāśrayāṃśca pañcopādānaskandhānagrataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataśca samanupaśyato yā kṣānti rucirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭi /
śīlaṃ vrataṃ śīlavratā(śrayāṃ)  śca pañcopādānaskandhān śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataśca samanupaśyato yā kṣāntī rūcirmatiḥ prekṣā dṛṣṭiḥ /
